chat-flood: Ye canna send messages that fast, please wait a while afore sendin oni mair.
chat-too-long: That message wis ower lang, please send ae shorter message. (Or twa).
chat-change-preferences: Chynge yer tauk preeferances (fulscreen n soonds)
tog-chat-fullscreen: Uise The tauk in the fulscreen mode (expereemental)
tog-chat-ping-mention: Pley ae soond oan receevin mentions
tog-chat-ping-pm: Pley ae soond oan receevin private messages
tog-chat-ping-message: Pley ae soond oan receevin ordinair messages
tog-chat-ping-joinleave: Pley ae soond whan uisers jyn or lea the tauk
chat-idle-minutes: This uiser haes been idle fer {{PLURAL:$1|ae minute|$1 minutes}}
chat-idle-hours: This uiser haes been idle fer {{PLURAL:$1|aen hoor|$1 hoors}}
chat-idle-more: This uiser haes been idle fer ower 24 hoors
action-viewpmlog: see the private blether messages log
